mapper.insert: insert into dtd_item_label (dtd_itlid, dt_inst_id, item_id, item_label) values (#{dtdItlid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{dtInstId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{itemId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{itemLabel,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.select: select dtd_itlid, dt_inst_id, item_id, item_label from dtd_item_label
select dtd_itlid, dt_inst_id, item_id, item_label from dtd_item_label WHERE dt_inst_id=#{dtInstId} AND item_id=#{itemId}
